name: Acention
description:
An ancient evil resides within the World Tree. Only you can climb to the top and defeat it. Will you prevail in time? Or will the Tree consume you...

How to Play:

WASD to move.

Left Click to shoot grapple.

Right Click to retract grapple rope.

Spacebar to jump.

Left CTRL to crouch/slide.

Left Shift to Air Dash (once per air time).

You only get one grapple per jump, resetting when grounded.

Try using your Air Dash while retracting the grapple and letting go for a huge momentum boost!
